title: Jatiluhung
author: Jatiluhung
content: I personally am a very busy person in my daily life. Because my job has demands or time limits to be completed (dead line). But a friend introduced me to Cryptocurrency or rather bitcoin. At first I felt there was no time to study it. But lately I'm even more interested in Cryptocurrencies. And began to study it on the sidelines of the break and on vacation.Although many unfamiliar terms that I found. But finding foreign terms is also something I usually find in my profession. Because every day I am dealing with words, more precisely writing.So reading has become my habit.That's what I do now on my day off which is to study crypto. So, how about your holiday? What do you do on holidays?

comments.author: DeathAngel
comments.body: Concentrate mostly on bitcoin, everything else is a shitcoin. I have some alts but my main bulk of funds is in bitcoin. On my holidays I like to do stuff other than cryptocurrency because it takes up so much of my time normally

comments.author: Jatiluhung
comments.body: Quote from: DeathAngel on May 31, 2022, 10:03:28 PMConcentrate mostly on bitcoin, everything else is a shitcoin. I have some alts but my main bulk of funds is in bitcoin. On my holidays I like to do stuff other than cryptocurrency because it takes up so much of my time normally I will take your advice about concentrating more on bitcoin. because I'm not really focused on bitcoin.you mean the opposite of me huh? because it looks like you spend more time in crypto. and when you are on vacation, you will definitely break away from crypto for a while. I'm interested in being like you. because I'm getting bored with my job now. but I have to think long because it turns out that the crypto world is much more risky and challenging.

comments.author: mich
comments.body: I love to go on a proper vacation. I don’t get that much time off from my work so when I do get some time off, I really like to do something special. I was recently on vacation and this was the first one since the pandemic. I went to Greece and stayed at an Airbnb. It was a ton of fun and wasn’t that expensive at all. I checked out a lot of the smaller islands, went sailing, fished a bit and even checked out a few museums. On other trips, I usually like to do something physical like tennis or hiking. I think a good mix between relaxing by the beach, cultural activities and physical activity are my favorite holidays.

comments.author: Jatiluhung
comments.body: Quote from: mich on June 01, 2022, 05:55:00 AMI love to go on a proper vacation. I don’t get that much time off from my work so when I do get some time off, I really like to do something special. I was recently on vacation and this was the first one since the pandemic. I went to Greece and stayed at an Airbnb. It was a ton of fun and wasn’t that expensive at all. I checked out a lot of the smaller islands, went sailing, fished a bit and even checked out a few museums. On other trips, I usually like to do something physical like tennis or hiking. I think a good mix between relaxing by the beach, cultural activities and physical activity are my favorite holidays.Traveling to Greece is my dream. but I haven't had a long holiday to go there. My job doesn't have long holidays. while from my country to go there is very far and takes about 15 hours on a plane flight.

comments.author: Jatiluhung
comments.body: Quote from: toxatyt05 on June 02, 2022, 01:16:35 PMLately I've been paying more attention to cryptocurrency and everything related to it. Trading is very interesting for me. Not long ago I started to study Relative Strength Index (RSI). The Relative Strength Index is another widely used indicator used by traders to evaluate market conditions and decide when the price movement becomes too extreme. There is a lot of information in the public domain that you can use, I visit this site very often to learn something new about cryptocurrency. Coincidentally, I am also in the process of studying the indicators commonly used in trading such as the RSI and so on. I am also interested in the crypto world and want to explore it more deeply.

comments.author: ErvinSmit
comments.body: I also spent all my free time studying cryptocurrencies and trading, but in the end I realized that it was much more profitable to start my own NFT-related business based on blockchain technologies. It is not necessary to be an expert in blockchain, because you can contact 4ire. It's a company that provides blockchain development services. These technologies are easily integrated into various platforms and sites, so there will be no difficulties with it.

comments.author: Mask00
comments.body: I think everyone has different tastes and everyone likes to work according to their own preferences. You have expressed your views here. My opinion may be different. Different people will have different opinions but most of the time when I work online I get that time when I am free.  I spend a lot of time trying to figure out how to make more money, and then I think about how I can spend most of my time online on cryptocurrency and how to make a good income from it.

comments.author: Jatiluhung
comments.body: Quote from: Mask00 on June 11, 2022, 03:22:10 PMI think everyone has different tastes and everyone likes to work according to their own preferences. You have expressed your views here. My opinion may be different. Different people will have different opinions but most of the time when I work online I get that time when I am free.  I spend a lot of time trying to figure out how to make more money, and then I think about how I can spend most of my time online on cryptocurrency and how to make a good income from it.of course. Everyone has their own way of spending and enjoying their free time. Because sometimes we experience a saturation point, namely boredom. and at times like that we sometimes need a vacation. But recently I became interested in cryptocurrencies so spending my free time learning about cryptocurrencies became a cure for my boredom.
